Articles.Content:
Well, I'm new like, this is my first thread-start. I have been playing for a while (0.21) and I love it. All the mods and the game concept struck me core deep from day one. And it never gets boring. As of now I have 19 KSP installs I have modded in different ways. I live in west part of Norway close to a ski resort walking distance, and one more 10 mins by car. When I go to the mountain to ski or snowboard, the helmet I wear is green (?). I had it long before I knew about Kerbals.

Something I have been thinking about a few times; It's a game I have been missing and waiting for, even before I knew anything about Kerbal. Kind of a weird "can't-explain" memory from way back.

These days I have some competition. The latest family lunatic is attracted to the kerbals. So more often then not, this is my early day time.

Sorry for the bad quality and shaking.

See you in space somewhere around.... something..

Kelli

Welcome! I wasn't able to watch the video cause I'm at school, but I'm sure its awesome. I'm so jealous though, I love skiing and the nearest ski resort is a 2 1/2 hour drive away, and It's only operational 3-4 months of the year.

Also, that's a lot of installs! I do the same thing though.

:-) Kerbal LolKats, what's not to love?

Welcome to the forums

LOL

If a cat eats a Kerbal does it turn into a Gremlin.

LOL

If a cat eats a Kerbal does it turn into a Gremlin.

Only if you feed it after midnight. (There is a part that includes this in its description, but I can't find it at the moment)

I guess the 4 month age speak for itself, he slowly leaning to sit and watch me play. He is adorable maniac.

Endersmens: Really?! I couldn't survive there for sure. In a 2 1/2 hour drive-radius I can ski in the summer too. There is a ski resort on a glacier that opens when all the other close down towards the summer. Sometimes it's like someone is doing a magic trick by taking a few bikini babes from the beach to the mountain and strapping a snowboard on their feet in the process. Who or whatever that is, I would love to know magic tricks like that.

Thanks guys. The cat-kerbal-gremlin description-thing I have to look up.
